column5: Yes, I think you got it. Even with the ones I already know, I don‚Äôt hang because I feel like they don‚Äôt want me there.
Since I completely cut him off.
I relate to this so much.

My priority is only my current relationship and I really do cherish it. 
This is why I feel frustrated when these thoughts occur. It‚Äôs like I‚Äôm walking listening to music and I suddenly remember that he exists. It‚Äôs frustrating. 

You‚Äôre gonna find someone soon! Don‚Äôt worry.
It‚Äôs been three and a half years!!!! :(

Thank you so much for saying that. I used to beat myself really hard for it. 
Definitely gonna see a counsellor.
Thank you so much for your input. I have cut him off completely.

I can do that. Thanks for your input. 
It‚Äôs just a bit frustrating because I feel like I have failed myself and I‚Äôm failing my boyfriend.

I‚Äôm sorry about everything. Hope you‚Äôre doing well now.

Wow, that‚Äôs awkward. I‚Äôm so sorry. 
Yeah this especially sucks because the guy I‚Äôm with right now is an angel.

Thanks for your insightful and helpful input. I spoke to him about that. And in that course, pointed out a few things that I did wrong. In short, blamed me for a lot of things again. 

I felt frustrated because no matter how hard I was trying to explain, he was not understanding and was playing blame games instead. 

Ended up telling him we‚Äôre not compatible and should separate. 

After hanging up he sends me a pic quote that says - ‚ÄúNever leave a true relationship for a few faults. Nobody is perfect. Nobody is correct. In the end affection is always greater than perfection.‚Äù 

Sigh.

Yes, and what sucks is his tone was of a playful banter. Sex is such a sensitive issue for me. When you‚Äôre naked there with someone, it only takes so much to make you feel insecure and under confident.
You‚Äôre beautiful, sis! Go rock it. üòç
My deep breasts are really down to earth. Is that a bad thing?
All the FUCKING time.
Yeah, the alcohol smells puts me off as well. I like their lotions better.
I‚Äôm not aware of that, sorry. I‚Äôm more concerned about the chemicals in the lotion.
Wow, there‚Äôs one called Pink Cashmere as well if I‚Äôm not wrong?
Is that ma man Johnny Sins?
No, they don‚Äôt make body sprays in that line. It‚Äôs lotions, body wash, candles and pillow mists even. The smell is not overpowering unlike their other lotions.
No no no...
Fun fact: Bath and body works was created as a knock off of The body shop. :P
I get what you are saying. My boyfriend is sensitive to chemicals and one time I made a mistake of wearing this lotion to bed and his eyes started tearing up. I got freaked out.
Yeah, I completely get what you‚Äôre saying. You get bored of it after a while. They have come up with a new aromatherapy range though. I have heard it‚Äôs different.

I agree. My aunt tells me that the products were better back then. 
Also, right now there‚Äôs just too many of them and some of them really seem similar to me.

My college friends love them. Everyone that wants to smell good opts for Bath and Body Works. 
But then there‚Äôs this whole debate about them being really chemically.
I love you ‚ù§Ô∏è

Oh my god you brought back so many memories. 
I was in that exact same phase once. I know what it feels like. It‚Äôs impossible to imagine living for so many years, right?

Let me tell you that it DOES get better. 

Fight it. Fight it with every nerve in your body. Not the feeling that you wanna die, but the depression. Fight it hard on most days and on some days let it loose. Take your medicines, see your therapist consistently. If possible, *if possible* exercise for 30 mins every day. Don‚Äôt beat yourself up if you can‚Äôt.

Some day it will get easier and you‚Äôll start imagining what your future would look like. That time, know that you have solved one piece of the puzzle. 

I still am depressed, but now I am curious to see what my future would look like. How would it turn out for me? And now I‚Äôm curious for yours too. 

Cheers, bud. x

Thanks for your kind words. I took my medicines when I needed them. I am gonna start therapy soon and I‚Äôm actively working out everyday. 
I‚Äôm doing everything I can do from my end to improve my mental health situation.

Never saw my LL as a gift but maybe it‚Äôs time to change perspective.
I feel sorry for my friends because they have to deal with such an uninteresting person like myself.
And I‚Äôm here admiring your skin...
Any heads up for side effects?
Thank you. You guys are the best!

Hey, I‚Äôm so sorry to hear that. 
I used to think I‚Äôm overthinking on this. 
He says he‚Äôs attracted to me all the time but I just don‚Äôt feel it. 
I should trust my gut.

It could be 1 and 2.
He‚Äôs immature. Also, younger than me. Could be because of that. 
Thanks a lot.
How do I gain will power?

Hey. I am not kidding I have the same story. 
I go to a law school. I too couldn‚Äôt make friends in the first year but then slowly I made a few...by the end of fourth year. 
I have only two close friends tho. 

I hope it gets better for you.
Hey, how was it? Please let me know.
Hey. Please seek medical help. Please.

Hey, 
Life sucks right now. But there‚Äôs always hope.

Hey, hope you‚Äôre doing well. 
This is the first time I got to know the story of someone on the other side of the table. 
Are you doing well now?
Please talk to her. It‚Äôs worth a shot. You have nothing to lose!
Don‚Äôt push yourself too hard. Just do whatever you can, it‚Äôs okay if it‚Äôs not enough.
Hey, thank you for your kind words. This gave me hope. :)
Just keep reading man.
Threw my phone away until it subsided.

Hey, what are you planning to do? 
I think I might cry again. 
I don‚Äôt even wanna study anymore even though I haven‚Äôt prepared much.

Struggles are really personal. 
Mine is no more difficult than yours. 
Yours is no easier than mine.

Yes. I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs my problem or the education system‚Äôs but it‚Äôs not working out for most of us. 
I‚Äôm tired and I want to cry.
I have the problem with retaining information as well. There‚Äôs always a way for everyone. Please never lose hope.

Hey, one page at a time. 
Good luck!
Tell me it will be better after I‚Äôm no longer a student?

Hey, I have anxiety too so it‚Äôs just not working for me right now. 
Thanks for your comment. I hope you find peace.

I‚Äôm so sorry to hear that. 
Please take it one step at a time.
Hey, was it worth it? I have contemplated dropping out so many times but I am almost there so might as well finish it.

Forget about the grades. Just focus on doing your best and getting done with those papers. That‚Äôs what I do. 
The perfectionist inside me cries every night before such exams but I have learnt to talk to myself now. It‚Äôs okay to have bad grades. It‚Äôs not your fault. Or at least that‚Äôs what I tell myself to feel better.

Empathy for yourself is so important. Don‚Äôt judge yourself for bad grades because you know what you have been through. 

Give yourself credit where it‚Äôs due.
Hope the future is rosy as fuck.
Hey. I see that you‚Äôre done with school now. Do you have any tips to deal with it?
Hey there. How do you deal with it?

Hey there. So sorry to hear about this.
Can you get any medical exemption from your school? 
I think every school should help out students like us. The fact is, we are different than the rest of them who are healthy. 
Don‚Äôt beat yourself up too much though. It‚Äôs not worth it. Keep reminding yourself that it‚Äôs not your fault that this happened to you. You didn‚Äôt choose it. Focus on completing the assignments rather than perfecting them. Trust me, I have tried it.

Hey there. 
Friendship is so similar to dating I can‚Äôt tell you. 
There might be a lot of females around you who you admire. What you gotta do is ask them out. For hangouts. 

Don‚Äôt be afraid of rejection and put yourself out there. 

Share. Females really feel the friendship when they can talk about stuff that bothers them or stuff that makes them happy. Bonus topic- guy problems. They always are a good topic to bond on. Lol

Talk about things you like that you have in common. 

Don‚Äôt be shy to invite them again. 

All the very best.
- from a fellow woman. :)

You‚Äôre right. In the long run none of this matters.
We should really focus on being happy and healthy while we are alive so that we at least have a good time before we die. :)
Mental health >>>> grades

Hey there. Does your school have a provision for medical exemption for mental health issues? I have taken exemptions for two semesters. Talk to someone from the administration. And if you don‚Äôt have the motivation to do it, ask someone to help you for it. Like a parent or a friend. 
All the very best to you.

Relax. Your career is just a part of your life. It‚Äôs NOT your entire life.
See it as a way of keeping you financially independent. Do whatever you want and enjoy your life.
I hope you‚Äôre getting the medical help that you need.
Our mental health is more important than the grades. Read that again.

We will be okay. 
Don‚Äôt try to mug up things next time.
I have realised when I don‚Äôt pressurise myself and just think of studying as ‚Äòreading and understanding‚Äô, I do better. 
During the exam, I write whatever I had understood.
Hey, sorry to hear about that. Honestly, I don‚Äôt even care about my grades anymore. I just want to finish this degree.
Man, I  thought my boyfriend cares about me :(
